definition: to cherish/to treasure/to take care of/to love and protect
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Respect the elders, love juniors , save all with mercy, care for others.
sentences.chinese: 敬老尊賢，愛護後進，慈悲渡衆，關懷他人。

sentences.english: People around her with his own words and deeds education to protect the environment, take good care of public property.
sentences.chinese: 她用自己的言行教育身邊的人保護環境，愛護公物。

sentences.english: Contact so long, he know quick son to take good care of people of the same group.
sentences.chinese: 接觸了這麼久，他是知道敏兒對自家人的愛護的。

sentences.english: From the acquaintance, to the death, he and cherishes constantly to her sympathizing .
sentences.chinese: 從相識，至死亡，他對她的體貼和愛護始終如一。

sentences.english: Pleased escribe your favourite animals to your friends after class. Now, class is over, see you.
sentences.chinese: 滲透思想教育動物是人類的好朋友，要愛護動物。

sentences.english: Treat other people’s belongings with care and love.
sentences.chinese: 對別人的財產也要關心和愛護。

sentences.english: The state’s constitution demands that the state “cherish” its public schools.
sentences.chinese: 州法規要求本州要“愛護”公立學校。

sentences.english: Still having rare Lu Da , god fighter mostly has the recall cherished by her .
sentences.chinese: 還有希路達，神鬥士大都有被她愛護的回憶。

sentences.english: To help improve your view of your body, take care of it.
sentences.chinese: 愛護你的身體也有助於改變你對它的看法。

sentences.english: Goats are insecure. They need to feel loved and protected.
sentences.chinese: 屬羊者缺乏安全感，需要別人愛護和保護。

sentences.english: Yes, I think we had better protect the animals from then on.
sentences.chinese: 恩，我想我們從現在起要好好愛護動物。

sentences.english: With the love of his mother and Jenny, Forrest Gump begins his running all his life.
sentences.chinese: 在他媽媽和珍妮的愛護下，阿甘開始跑遍整個人生。

sentences.english: A dog reacts to kindness by wagging its tail .
sentences.chinese: 狗搖尾巴以報答人們的愛護。

sentences.english: Thank you for your understanding and tolerance, for one pair of Junior's love and concern.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝您的理解和包容，出於一個對小輩的愛護和關心。

sentences.english: All citizens and organizations shall respect and care for the National Flag.
sentences.chinese: 每個平正易近和組織，都理當尊敬和愛護國旗。

sentences.english: How can you protect the animals?
sentences.chinese: 我們應該如何愛護動物呢？

definition: to show concern and care for
to be concerned about/to care about
to bless/to cherish/to take good care of/to conserve
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to attach importance to sth/to value
to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
to empathize/to allow (for sth)/to show understanding/to appreciate
